name: Thunder
effect: Inflicts Wounds. Can hit Aerial targets using Fly, Bounce or Sky Drop. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe. If performed under Sunny Weather, Accuracy becomes -3 instead. If performed under Rain Weather, Ignore this Moves Reduced Accuracy. -2 Accuracy.
description: The Pokemon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.
